name: Afternoon Survival Session
description: The final stretch with full awareness that it's going to be a stretch. The banter provides solidarity without false motivation. Yes, it's 4pm. Yes, there are still emails. No, we're not going to pretend that's fine. But we're all here together.

presenters.notes: Mostly duo for solidarity during the afternoon push

tone.mood: Tired but grimly determined, 'let's just get through this' solidarity

check_ins: Not quite done yet. Possibly never done.
sample_lines: It's 4pm. Not quite done, not quite giving up. Just existing in the awkward middle.
One more hour. Maybe two. Possibly three if that email thread continues.
That was 'Afternoon Survival' requested by James who's 'definitely finishing on time today.' James, we admire the optimism.
For everyone who's had four coffees and is somehow still tired: science can't explain it, but we feel it.

handover.style: Tired but relieved handover, acknowledging the end of the work day approaching

winter.tone_adjustment: Reference darkness falling early, demoralizing dark afternoons

summer.tone_adjustment: Reference still being light outside, nice weather wasted indoors

christmas_period.tone_adjustment: Acknowledge reduced work, people finishing early, holiday time
christmas_period.notes: Some people still working through holidays

ai_budget.notes: 50% talk = 90 minutes = 5400 seconds of TTS maximum, 50% music = 90 minutes
